website_summaries.verdict: An adjustable, reusable swim diaper ideal for smaller infants and toddlers.
pros: Adjustable snaps to fit your baby
Easy to put on and remove
Soft elastic around the legs and waist
cons: May be too small for larger infants and toddlers

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and high quality. My baby is a bit of a fatty. This suit fit him great when he was 18 lbs, and still fits great around his chunky legs at 23 lbs. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for skinny baby
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my skinny little baby. I started using this when my son was 4 months and weighed 8 lbs. He was premature and no other swim diapers fit him. These are adjustable and fit great around his skinny legs with no leaks so far.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We put this diaper on our baby under a bodysuit and by the time we walked to the beach he was completely wet from his pee. I can imagine that poop might not get out, but it doesn't work if he's wet before getting in the water and his suit is full of pee.
customer_reviews.author: Lugarda Parra

customer_reviews.title: Stop wasting money on disposable swim diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper! So happy I switched from disposable swim diapers to this! The diaper keeps poop in really well and it so easy to clean. I often rinse with a hose on the way into the house big you can easily rinse with in the sink. My son is 25lbs, 16 months and wears a size 5 Huggies snug and dry (Runs small), I snap this diaper on the last row or one side on the last row and the other on the second to last. Will definitely buying another and then the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Not for chunky babies
customer_reviews.text: I chose this diaper because it is adjustable. My son is 10 months and 21 pounds. I put it on the largest snaps and it is very right around his waist and legs, I can’t see him being able to wear it for much longer. It’s done the job so far The two times he’s worn it but disappointed he’ll grow out of it so soon. It also smells horrid when he pees in it. Doesn’t even smell like pee I don’t know how to explain it. It smells like it even after washing but then once it’s dried it smells ok, so strange
customer_reviews.author: Karli J. Risk

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: The swim diaper was easy to adjust once on and comfortable for our 9 month old! I would highly recommend these cute swim diapers and have tagged the company in all my related social media posts, so folks know who to buy from!
customer_reviews.author: LaToya C.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used with poop stains
customer_reviews.text: The diaper arrived used and was covered in poop stains. (See pics) Nothing could have been more disgusting!! I am assuming someone returned it after using it and the company simply did not check the item and then shipped it to us as if it was brand new. These were not small stains either. I was extremely grossed out. Thank god I saw the stains and didn’t put it on my baby! I will be returning this ASAP and I sure hope they check it out when they get it back but I wouldn’t be surprised if they just ship it to some other unsuspecting parent.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Elizabeth Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not great fit
customer_reviews.text: It seems a lot of the reviewers don’t understand that swim diapers are not meant to hold pee. It’s super cute and nicely built but my son is skinny and only weighs 25 lbs. even on the biggest snap settings it kept falling down his waist and left very deep imprints on his skin. Besides the fit everything else was great. Will probably have to return as it doesn’t seem to comfortable on him.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight for 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when my son started infant swim lessons at 9 months old. Great idea since they're re-usable and environmentally friendly. I imagine our landfills are like 70% diapers. He never once pooped in these so I can't speak to the absorbency and effectiveness at all. Unfortunately they left red marks on his thighs even on the loosest configuration. Will try them again after he thins out as an older toddler or save for next kid who might be less thunderously thighed.
customer_reviews.author: thrillhouse

customer_reviews.title: a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable, size is very adjustable with lots of buttons. Recently used for the first time for baby’s first dip in the pool at 3 months old and it was super easy to put on and fit well. It can easily be washed and dried in a washing machine and dryer with the rest of baby’s clothes. Way better than disposable swim diapers that swell up as soon as they’re in the water, and better for the environment!
customer_reviews.author: Emi K

customer_reviews.title: Best swimsuit purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This swim diaper is GREAT! We wore out the first one by swimming nearly every day throughout summer during the first two years of my sons life, and it held up great considering the amount of use it got. We just ordered our second one for my now 2 year old and it's the best purchase and a huge $ saver. It doesn't hold it pee incredibly well, but it definitely did what it needed to do with pop and held it in well. It ws easy to clean and left no stains. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Aubree G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot compare this to any other swim diaper because i did a lot of research to not waste time and money but we are very happy with these. I have to say, we have been very lucky because we have used these a lot and our baby has not pooped in them yet so i can't speak to that part but these are great. You can tell the people that designed these really care that you and your baby get everything you need in a little package. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but run small
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these when my son was about 8 mos and close to 18lb. The prints are adorable, but there's no way this can go up to 36lbs! He was already on the last button at 18 lbs, and he's now at 11.5mo/22lbs these are getting really tight across his tummy/groin area. They work well - he only ever had a very mild number 2 early on, but they contained it fine. Obviously if he pees, it'll be wet, but otherwise these work well. I would put the max weight around 23lb, maybe 25 lbs if your kid is more tall/lanky, and not a tubster with a belly and chunky thighs like my son.
customer_reviews.author: Robin T

customer_reviews.title: Little tight around thighs but doesn’t hold water
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold water and is awesome! I bought some alvababy swim diapers and they held water, had to return, so I will stick with this brand now. Was a little tight (left slight marks around thighs) and my son is 22 months at 23 lbs slim. Next time I’d buy 2-5 yr size on their website
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute too!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient daiper swim trunks. My 6 month old is 17.5lbs and fits them perfectly. There are 3 size options with the given buttons...(maybe 6 if you only adjust one side vs both at a time) and he uses the middle size. Cleaning them was easy. One seems to be enough for now but I will be buying more before the summer. My baby Michael Phelps seemed comfortable into them as well. Ill have photos posted on Instagram within the week tagging this brand
customer_reviews.author: zmath

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: Who the heck figured out the sizing on this? My son is in the 50% percentile and this leaves terrible marks on him even on the widest setting. We started using this around 9 months old and he’s almost 1 year old now. It’s gotten worse and worse. We are use to snaps. We cloth diaper so this was suppose to be a breeze but this item SUCKS. Don’t buy it unless your child is VERY skinny.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pool or beach!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year, but baby was still very small and we just ended up using the throw away swim diapers. This year, we are able to use it more and it is great! Very cute print, easy to pull on, and adjustable! My son is 14 months old, wearing 18 month clothes and here I have it adjusted one snap up from the smallest size. I anticipate ordering another one for this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Campanelli

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love this swim diaper. We bought it at first because the disposable ones didn't fit him yet. This one is great because it will fit him for a long time. We have it as small as it goes now and it fits great. It's easy to clean and is much more affordable than disposable swim diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my son and then sat him on my lap. He peed and it went straight through on to me as if he were naked. What?! I checked to make sure it was on snuggly and so did my husband. It happened again at the pool. I went back to iplay. There’s isn’t adjustable but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This little swim diaper is AMAZING! It was so much easier than messing with the bulky disposable swim diapers. And OH SO CUTE!!! My 15 month old is able to move like normal in them as opposed to the classic long swim shorts. We got so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Not for chunky babies
customer_reviews.text: Great little diaper and super cute! However it did not fit my 10 month old. He is 24 inches long and 24 pounds. I could barely get the buttons closed around his waist. Sadly I will not be able to use this again so that's upsetting as it was expensive for half hour of uncomfortable use. No way the diaper I received would fit an average baby over about 4 months. It was tiny!!
customer_reviews.author: Yoster

customer_reviews.title: Great swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: Works great and holds in poop. Able to change the size for your growing child so the waist line is not too tight. Material is not as constricting as other swim diapers such as iswim diaper which material is a little thicker which makes it bulking and constricting. Like this diaper a lot, would recommend purchasing over iswim (which has high reviews).
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective, cute, and eco-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: We love this swim diaper! It's cute enough to be worn on it's own or with a top only. I also love that it will fit for years to come. We've used it several times but it still looks brand-new! I like the thinness of the material as it causes it to dry very quickly (as opposed to another swim diaper we have). The customer service was excellent! I received live messages quickly and the lady was so personable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Minor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper and company!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great company! I love that they sent a message saying when they are blessed they like to share in the blessing and give to charity! They are a company I will highly recommend. The cute diaper was awesome...my 3 month old wore it and went number 2 and it stayed in. We were able to wash it out and there were no stains. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller then description
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed because my son is only 27lbs wearing size 4 diaper and this was too tight on him. I tried it on the largest setting and he said it hurts him because the button by his hip is hurting him and it was too tight. Was really hoping he would like it because i like the design and it does feel like it’s good material (which is why I gave it 2 stars). However we have a swim lesson tomorrow and we don’t have a swim diaper for him now. Just wish the description was more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Ho

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and because it is so customizable, it fits like a charm!! It's obviously very well made. Upon first look, there are a LOT of snaps but the tutorial instructions about how to fit this to your baby were perfectly written and very easy to understand! We will not be buying any more disposable swim diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My LO was 2 months old when we tried this out for the first time. We were at a beach house with a pool on vacation and I didn't want the fun to be spoiled by poop in the pool. We doubled up and used a disposable swimming under the reusable diaper. My LO ended up going #2 and it leaked through the disposable diaper and the reusable didn't let it get through. It was a vacation saver!
customer_reviews.author: C Mahorney

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable. Soft. Cute.  Absorbent.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for swimming lessons and used it for the beach. Soft. Easy to adjust (which is so great to be able to adjust to your child’s size). My little guy hasn’t had a bowel movement on it yet, so not sure how the cleaning and absorbency is yet. Will update once i do.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie M.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got these and not swim trunks
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. Colors are great, don’t fade. Love how this is adjustable for baby’s growth. Snaps hold very well. Easy to put on, unless you have a wiggly baby- all those snaps take time especially if you need it on the smallest setting. Overall a great swimsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazed

customer_reviews.title: Will come back when we need more!
customer_reviews.text: So far we have used this multiple times for swim lessons. Easy to put on, easy to clean, seems comfortable for my son. 8 months/20 pounds and we have easily adjusted which snaps to use as he grows. We haven't had any accidents yet in the water to see what will happen then, but so far I really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: DRock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preventing pool evacuations
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 month old to go swimming in, it looks like it will fit him for several more months. Holds in the poop so you won't be the parent with the kid who pooped in the pool. The makers of this product also have a hilarious tag of how to clean and not clean the reusuable diaper. Thanks for the laugh!
customer_reviews.author: KVW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swim diaper! I love that you can adjust the size and it grows with your kiddo. It’s also super easy to wash. I throw it in a cold wash cycle and let it air dry after. The fabric is comfortable and doesn’t irritate my baby’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great swim diaper NOT diaper cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice swim diaper, buttons are a little confusing but has multiple buttons for adjusting the size. But don’t be like me as a first time mom that has never used a swim diaper I thought this was a diaper cover so I put my baby in the pool with this over a normal diaper and my baby’s diaper absorbed half the water in his tiny baby pool..... Oops
customer_reviews.author: Seth and Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great that the size adjusts, but may not hold EBF stools
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this on my son yet (he is 4months) but I have washed it once and have tried it on him and it fits him well. We purchased it so he has something to grow with him this summer. It isn’t as thick as the iplay ones (but those aren’t size adjustable) so we will use this one for the beach this summer and the iplay for swimming lessons at the pool, until we introduce solids and his waste becomes more solid. It is very cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Elise L'Herault

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: We signed our 4.5 month old up for swim classes, and purchased this swim diaper and another similar style. I really like how this one adjusts in two different ways, and that it can grow with her as she gets bigger! It’s great in the pool, and the adjustable fit means it’s nice and snug to do what it needs to do. We ended up returning the other one and buying a second of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Happy water baby without leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product can grow with your little one. I used this first on our vacation with a disposable under and it worked perfectly! No leaks, no chafing, perfectly happy water baby. And the designs are so cute. I am planning on getting another in a different color for when he starts his little swim class. The material and quality of product is wonderful. I was surprised at the quality for such a great price. Similar items from other companies don’t even compare, as I have 2 other reusable swim diapers that I trashed when after I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Liz W

customer_reviews.title: Customizable fit and easy to get on and off with snap sides
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the fit, but there are so many buttons that allow you to customize the fit, both in length and width. Also, the snaps on both sides make it easy to take on and off. I’m definitely a fan of the design and it’s well made. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Purchased 2 pair for my 10 week old and I am very impressed with the design and how they are easily adjustable to grow with you baby. Great value. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L

customer_reviews.title: Best swim diaper!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 20lb six month old and she'll be able to wear it until shes two. The snaps are super sturdy and the diaper legitimately holds in any solid waste. Very cute also. No more exploding disposable diapers in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Newton

customer_reviews.title: Cuter, comfier, lasts longer
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful swim diaper. So much better than the ones that are supposed to fit for a certain age and weight, that my daughter grows out of in what feels like a day. I wish I'd bought these sooner. They're thin compared to some brands, but I actually think it's better to have less bulk with the same effectiveness. They still seem a little snug around the legs, but I realize their whole job is to keep stuff in and that's why.
customer_reviews.author: Nafb

customer_reviews.title: Great little swim diaper!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this several times with our daughter and it's worked great each time! Easy on and off, appears to hold any issues while swimming... good to go! We'd purchase this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and work perfectly. Way better than buying disposable swim diapers. And you can just throw them in the washer to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Held the pee in!
customer_reviews.text: Our kid peed in this before going in the pool, but I didnt realize it until the end of the lesson. He seemed comfortable in this, and I like that it will grow with him over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: P$

customer_reviews.title: Reusuable Swim Diaper is Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the reusable swim diaper... the only negative (which is slight) is I bought the size 5 and my grandson is only 30 pounds and it was a bit snug of a fit on him. I had it on the largest of the adjustable snaps as well. But, other than that it was perfect for him during his swimming lessons!
customer_reviews.author: Janet C

customer_reviews.title: Bit small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. But other than sizing being off, appreciate these because we would otherwise go through a ton of disposable swim diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: I stumbled upon this reusable swim diaper and I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying disposable swim diapers so I began the hunt for an alternative. I stumbled upon this reusable swim diaper and I'm so glad I did! It's a very cute design and I can get to fit my son so well! I wish I had bought it sooner. I'm so glad that it should fit him in any swim adventures we go on in the next year or so. It's a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Fits well , super cute, durable with great material
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits my baby really well and looks super cute :) it doesn't hold pee ( not supposed too) its made with really nice material it was a little difficult to figure out at first even with the video on their website I had to YouTube it but the top snaps on the front snap on the bottom ones on the front to make it short to fit a smaller baby :)
customer_reviews.author: lex

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable swim diaper!
customer_reviews.text: For swim lessons, a disposable diaper is nice. In and out 30 minutes. But hanging by the pool or beach, this reusable diaper is great! I love all the different snap options, making it a long-term option and investment. It's comfy for my daughter and cute looking!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mickus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper. Worked well for my little man. Every boy in my class had the same one in other patterns. Also love the care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: ashley west

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sensible
customer_reviews.text: What drew me to this product initially was how cute the design was - then I saw the reviews and purchased one. My little one started swim lessons at 6 months of age and I wanted something that could grow with him. These fit the bill! I love how they have so many snaps to fit my little one! He is a bean pole so being able to adjust the waist and legs is so helpful to get a good fit :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality swim diaper. Fits my almost 3-year ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality swim diaper. Fits my almost 3-year old (32lbs) snuggly but fit just right while he was still wearing 2T. He wears this one swim diaper almost every week for swim lessons. We'll still be able to use it for a while...probably until he is 100% potty trained. I'll buy this brand again for my twins when they are ready for swim lessons, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: Little fish, save the pool
customer_reviews.text: They are adjustable and grow with my little one. Doesn't absorbe the urine but sure does keep the poop in! Pool saver for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Belen

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to disposable swim diapers
customer_reviews.text: Disposable swim diapers are expensive. This is a great alternative if you’re regularly taking your little one in the water. My little guy had a small poop and this totally contained it. Not sure how much it absorbs pee cuz I always just put it one right before we get in the pool and take it off and switch back to regular diapers within a few minutes of getting out. I do really like the adjustability of this as well since I know it will grow with us as long as we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Stargzr28

customer_reviews.title: Premier reusable swim diaper for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome swim diaper!! Super thin yet absorbent, durable material, and a really cute print. My lil guy is on the small side though and is 10mos old. The size says up to 36mos and I’m on the “largest” setting already so I doubt it will fit much past this summer so if you have a larger baby I’d be conscious of that. For the money and the universe it’s a much better option than disposables hands down! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kael C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied! I haven't had a poopie in the pool yet but I love how it adjust! It is perfect fir my little one! I keep his diaper on and put the cover over it! It is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Swim Class Diapers
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a pair of reusable swim diapers for his swimming class. These are great! They are only meant to hold their poop while you get them out of the pool to change them. It does not hold urine (thankfully, I had my bathing suit on when he peed). My little guy is 6 months old and weights 20lbs but he is long, and he is at the last adjustable strap.
customer_reviews.author: Day C

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! So worth the money! Love that it’s reusable and I don’t have to buy disposable swim diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Love having a reuseable diaper
customer_reviews.text: This diaper has been great thus far! I'm excited that I don't need to buy one again for my next baby as they will be able to use this one adjusted. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: oilsmama

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 month old baby boy when we signed up for Parent/Child swim classes. It was very easy to put on him and adjust the size so they're right for him. He usually wears disposable diapers, and he did not mind wearing these and did not seem to notice a difference at all. He has worn them in the pool and in salt water at the beach, sometimes with and sometimes without a bathing suit over them. No leaks. Washes and dries nicely.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper is excellent. Pros: - Easy to get on and off with the snaps (rather than pulling over the legs) - Smaller/less puffy than other's I've tried - Adjustable, so it could grow with your baby My toddler is 25 pounds, 17 months, and I doubt this will fit next summer. I wish I'd bought it sooner! Then I wouldn't have needed 3 different swim diapers over 2 summers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty small on my son
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time we've tried non-disposable swim diapers, and they work OK. They are pretty small on my son, who is now about 23lb. Any bigger and it won't work any more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable snaps saved me in a pinch!
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable snaps allow you to adjust in all dimensions. This saved me on the first day of swim lessons when I discovered they wanted a disposable swim diaper UNDER a regular swim diaper. I was able to change the snaps all around and make it fit him. Had I bought a non-adjustable swim diaper, I would have ended up with a diaper that was too small at swim lessons or too big when not at swim lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Reusable, easy to machine wash, adjustable to grow with baby and cute designs!
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these as a gift and realized how amazing they are when we started swimming lessons at 6 months old. Bought another pair just to have an alternate. We haven't had to clean any poop out of them (yet?) but they have worked great for us so far.
customer_reviews.author: jta

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: i love this diaper because it is well done, very easy to adjust and perfect fit. I would recommend it for playing in a swimming pool and/or beach trips!
customer_reviews.author: E.D

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times so far but it has worked very well for us. Cute design too. Gotten compliments every time we’ve used it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great and much better than buying disposable swim diapers. Not sure if it will really fit my baby for as long as it claims, but it’s great for now. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. You can adjust them how you want thanks to a lot snaps
customer_reviews.author: Nicolae

customer_reviews.title: Great swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my newest littlest he’s 8 months old now. Been wearing it since 6 months. I will never go back to disposable. This grows with him and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Birdsall

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but these swim diapers are so much easier to get on and off (even with snug snaps!) and fit well on my 12 month old who wears 24m clothes- with room to expand to give me hope we'll be able to use them next summer too.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse'sGirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 month old son, and it is absolutely a great buy. I wish I would of found it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Brasher

customer_reviews.title: Fits even chubby babies!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for my chunk of a 9 month old to get us through our first round of swim lessons. He is 29” and 24 lbs. These fit great and while we managed to get through without any accidents I was confident they would have held the poop in long enough to change him. Easy to machine wash and dry. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: legaleaglet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, most stylish, and user friendly hands down, took my son to the hot springs and got tons of compliments and asked where to buy. Look no further, use product instructions and no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: My one year old is in weekly swimming lessons and this works perfectly. It’s cheaper and less waste than disposable. The fish tail pattern is cute. It seems durable and we are satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: SnowWolf

customer_reviews.title: One size really fits all
customer_reviews.text: This is the best swim diaper we have tried. It is SUPER customizable and holds in the messes. I also love that you can unsnap it to take in off so that you aren't sliding a dirty diaper down babies legs (gross). Patterns are super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: miasisme

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, adjustable, and so cute! Our little man has "thunder thighs" as I like to call them, and I love that we can adjust and snap to fit his waist and thighs. Saves us time and money not having to constantly shop for a bigger size every few pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: It adjusted down to fit him snugly and was easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Used our swim diaper for the first time on my 2 month old. He is a lean, skinny guy and weighs 12 lbs. It adjusted down to fit him snugly and was easy to adjust. I think it will fit him for quite some time because it will adjust out as he gets bigger. He is exclusively breastfed and the diaper did hold a BF baby poop. We only ordered one, so we took it off him and my husband rinsed it out. He said it was very easy to rinse clean. It fit nice and didn't get saggy, my son seemed comfortable in it, and it contained the Poop! Win win for this cute turtle diaper!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper and good value
customer_reviews.text: Used for my tiny baby the first year and love the fact that I can use again next year! Love not having to use disposable swim diapers. Great company too!
customer_reviews.author: Sara U.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent swim diaper!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used reusable diapers before but we wanted to take my 5 1/2 month old swimming in the in laws pool and disposable swim diapers don't come small enough. I found this and it's worked perfectly. It's snug on her without her being uncomfortable. She has yet to poop in it but it looks like it will contain it. I'm happy we'll be able to use it for more than one summer because of all the snaps!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Very customizable for size
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The nicest part about this is how adjustable it is. There are series of snaps to make width and length shorter or longer. We have only used a few times, but no fading. It is working well and I would recommend. It dries quite quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and worked as it should
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11 weeks old and about 12.5 pounds. the diaper fit well and we used it for his first outing to a swimming pool. Glad we did, because he made use of it immediately and it worked great. Held in the waste and was easy to clean after, plan to get good use out of this diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Hays

customer_reviews.title: Buy this instead of disposable ones!
customer_reviews.text: Love this one! Worth your money! It's just amazing! Please stop buying the disposable ones! This grows with your baby!
customer_reviews.author: Crisine

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute and a great alternative to expensive swim diapers! Baby didn’t poop while we were swimming so.. I can’t give that feedback but it is designed so you can adjust the fit to make sure it doesn’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Cutest swim diaper ever
customer_reviews.text: This swim diaper is so cute!!! Good material and comfy to wear. My little one love to wear it to his swim class!
customer_reviews.author: Miley Song

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute swim
customer_reviews.text: Love these swim diapers! We bought 2 Paris and both have held up well with the amount of pool swimming and beach days we’ve spent in them. Decent priced and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: This swim diaper is amazing and so easy to snap on to fit. now I can't say about poop, because he hasn't pooped in it yet, but I am going to order another one for backup
customer_reviews.author: stephen thornton

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Poo didn't leak out at all
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Poo didn't leak out at all. Easy to wash. Adjustable to accommodate my daughter's growth.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Delightful and works great
customer_reviews.text: Cute, easy to clean and use. Also, if you read the washing instructions tag you will find it quite silly and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable swim diaper!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this swim diaper! I had some difficulty finding a swim diaper small enough for a 3 month old, and then I saw this one. It has multiple snaps for completely adjustable fit. It fits her perfectly now, at approximately 13lbs, and it will continue to grow with her. Also love that it can just be rinsed out and then thrown in the washing machine! Overall extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy A

customer_reviews.title: Buttons gave my son a blister
customer_reviews.text: It gave my son a blister where the buttons are. I tried it again and it gave him bad red marks. My son is only 8month old.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... in pools and at the beach and are so happy with how well it was made and designed
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this reusable swim diaper often for the past 6 months in pools and at the beach and are so happy with how well it was made and designed. Very cute design too!
customer_reviews.author: Nic Tag

customer_reviews.title: Very adjustable for different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can adjust this to your baby's size and as they grow! We used this for swimming lessons over a disposable diaper and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable and the care instructions are hilarious
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable and the care instructions are hilarious. It took me a few times to get a hang of the snaps, but other than that there were not any issues. I have only used it once but so far so good, it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 20 months. I loved how the diaper could be adjusted to fit perfectly for each baby from skinny to chubby. We didn't have any problems with the diaper and my daughter loved it. Also, timely delivery, instructions, and a follow-up email reflected a good service. I hope there will be more designs available in future :).
customer_reviews.author: Prometheus

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought both colors of these swim diapers for a beach trip. We have a 15 month old and they worked perfectly. Multiple snaps make it easy to find the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: NC Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fit
customer_reviews.text: No problems with swim diaper. Easy to figure out. Didn’t need to look up video to fit baby. Luckily baby did not soil in diaper, so did not deal with that. But feel confident there wouldn’t be problems if he had.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good absorbency without getting soggy!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Perfect for my 4month old. Should work this whole summer for him and maybe next! Love the brilliance of the cleaning instructions- hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying pool time with my baby now. My baby was 5 month old when i purchased this and it fits her in medium range.
customer_reviews.author: Bujinlkham Bayar

customer_reviews.title: perfect for not holding in too much water and becoming ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is a bit small. Fast drying. Thin material, perfect for not holding in too much water and becoming bulky. Haven't had any accidents in it so, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Salsamanca

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper because it’s worked every single time we have went to the pool. Not once has he pooped in it so I’m unsure how that holds up, but other than that perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: This holds everything in that it is supposed to. It isnt for urine, just the bm. I like the size adjustments. They fit my 20 month old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Minamyer

product_meta.title: Nageuret Reusable Swim Diaper, Adjustable & Stylish Fits Diapers Sizes N-5 (8-36lbs) Ultra Premium Quality for Eco-Friendly Baby Shower Gifts & Swimming Lessons (Fish- Red, Green, Blue)
feature_bullets: ✅ SAVE HUNDREDS: SWITCH TO THE BEST ECO-FRIENDLY REUSABLE SWIM DIAPER What's better than looking enviably-cute, saving money, & saving the environment as a family? Unlike leading disposable national brand baby swim diapers, our swim diaper is reusable (goodbye carbon footprint) and will last longer than the leading single-size reusable brands because it adjusts between sizes N and 5 in diapers (hello savings)!

✅ SUPERIOR QUALITY, ADJUSTABLE, WASHABLE & REUSABLE SWIM DIAPER The Nageuret line of reusable cloth swim diapers are designed for families who require premium, elite-level products. Washable and adjustable between 8-36 lbs, our CPSIA-tested snaps adjust around the waist & legs with three different sizes, and three different size adjustments for the height of the baby swim diapers.

✅ WATERPROOF & STYLISH Outer shell is made from a premium soft breathable waterproof 100% PUL polyester cloth fabric featuring cute original prints so your little Beau or Belle can swim in style while preventing mass pool evacuations from floaty friends. The inside is an extremely soft premium Polyester mesh designed for easy washing and baby comfort. The one-of-a-kind trendy patterns are designed exclusively by Beau & Belle Littles In Colorado. Remember: Only you can prevent pool evacuations

✅ ECO-FRIENDLY As a small family-owned company in Colorado, the outdoors is a huge part of our life. In 2015 we determined to stop throwing our money away with the disposable swim diapers (Huggies, Pampers, etc) & develop a premium, high-end washable, waterproof, reusable cloth swimming diaper alternative because we want our son to grow up in the beautiful Colorado we grew up in.

✅ NO RISK + GIVE BACK Our 1-year better than money-back guarantee on every Nageuret Reusable Swimming Diaper ensures that if something happens to your swim diaper, we will refund your money AND give you a new swim diaper of your choice! Additionally we donate 5% of our sales yearly to Compassion International, so you can feel good about your purchase. Save money, Save the environment, and save children in need. Nothing to lose: Click Add to Cart to get your little Beau or Belle swimming today.

specifications.Best uses: Reusable Swim Diaper, for Toddlers and Infants. Recommended by moms above iPlay Swim Diaper or Charlie Banana Swim Diaper styles for both boys and girls. Reusable Waterproof swim diapers are adjustable for small, medium and large fits. A Must Have for Your Baby.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,377 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
